snippet: Having positioned itself as a key player in the conflict, the Kremlin faces frustration in Western capitals and a deepening alienation among Russia’s partners in the Arab world.
abstract: News analysis; Moscow faces frustration in Western capitals, where it is seen as complicit in the killing of civilians by forces loyal to Sryian Pres Bashar al-Assad, and a deepening alienation among Russia's partners in the Arab world, who see Moscow as coming to the aid of dictators.
lead_paragraph: Having positioned itself as a key player in the conflict, the Kremlin faces frustration in Western capitals and a deepening alienation among Russia’s partners in the Arab world.

headline.seo: In Its Stance on Syria, Russia Takes Substantial Risks
headline.main: In Its Unyielding Stance on Syria, Russia Takes Substantial Risks in Middle East
headline.print_headline: In Its Unyielding Stance on Syria, Russia Takes Substantial Risks in Middle East
